evidence.text: No appeal to any appellate court mentioned in any document
ORDER GRANTING PLAINTIFFS' MOTION FOR A TEMPORARY RESTRAINING ORDER. Signed by Judge Trina L. Thompson on 8/15/2023.

extracted.value: Judge Trina L. Thompson granted Plaintiffs' Motion for a Temporary Restraining Order on August 15, 2023, effective until September 6, 2023, with a Preliminary Injunction Hearing scheduled for September 6, 2023.

evidence.text: ORDER Extending and Modifying Temporary Restraining Order and Continuing Hearing. Signed by Judge Edward M. Chen on 9/7/2023.

extracted.value: Judge Edward M. Chen extended and modified the Temporary Restraining Order on September 7, 2023, and continued the Preliminary Injunction Hearing to October 2, 2023.

evidence.text: COMPLAINT AND EX PARTE APPLICATION FOR A TRO AND PI, against All Defendants. Filed by Camp Integrity, Courtney Huff, Amalia Mendoza, Shaleeta Boyd, Anker Aardalen, Floyd Barrow, Donald Hensley, Jeff Grove, Eddy Metz, Brian Nelson, Christie Marie Cook. (Attachments: # 1 Complaint Continued, # 2 Complaint Continued, # 3 Complaint Continued, # 4 Complaint Continued, # 5 Civil Cover Sheet)(wsn, COURT STAFF) (Filed on 8/11/2023) (Entered: 08/14/2023)

extracted.value: Plaintiffs Camp Integrity, Courtney Huff, Amalia Mendoza, Shaleeta Boyd, Anker Aardalen, Floyd Barrow, Donald Hensley, Jeff Grove, Eddy Metz, Brian Nelson, and Christie Marie Cook filed a Complaint and Ex Parte Application for a Temporary Restraining Order and Preliminary Injunction on August 11, 2023, seeking to halt implementation of San Rafael Code 19.50 and SMC 19.20.080(c).

evidence.text: MOTION FOR ACCOMMODATIONS, filed by Anker Aardalen, Floyd Barrow, Shaleeta Boyd, Christie Marie Cook, Jeff Grove, Donald Hensley, Courtney Huff, Amalia Mendoza, Eddy Metz, Brian Nelson. (Attachments: # 1 Proposed Order)(wsn, COURT STAFF) (Filed on 8/11/2023) (Entered: 08/14/2023)

evidence.text: AMENDED COMPLAINT Adding New Plaintiffs against All Defendants. Filed byBrian Nelson. (Nelson, Brian) (Filed on 9/26/2023) (Entered: 09/26/2023)

extracted.value: Brian Nelson filed an Amended Complaint adding new plaintiffs on September 26, 2023, to expand the plaintiff group in the case.
